DOC.brief_title: The Effective Effect-Site Propofol Concentration Induction Intubation Schnider Model Parturients
DOC.detailed_description: The temperature maintain 22˚ C operating room . Patients place supine 15°left lateral tilt achieve use wedge right buttock . Electrocardiograph ( ECG ) , pulse oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) , systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) , mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) heart rate ( HR ) monitor one anesthesiologist ( S/5 Anesthesia Monitor , GE Healthcare , Helsinki , Finland ) , Bispectral Index ( BIS ) value ( A2000 BIS® XP monitor , version 3.2 ; Aspect Medical Systems Inc. , Newton , MA ) obtain record . The BIS smoothing time period set 15 second . The mean value above-mentioned parameter record 3-min interval three consecutive time determine baseline value . Peripheral vein catheterization right hand perform prehydration give . A fixed volume 500 mL hydroxyethyl starch solution infuse rate 0.2 ml.kg-1.min-1 , Lactated Ringer 's solution infuse rate end surgery . Using computer-generated random-number sequence , patient allocate 1 6 group predefined propofol target Ce induction , namely , 4.0 , 4.5 , 5.0 , 5.5 , 6.0 , 6.5 µg.mL-1 . General anesthesia induce fentanyl 3 µg.kg-1 . Propofol administer TCI device achieve predetermine target propofol Ce . Loss consciousness define disappearance eyelash reflex assess every 5 second patient spontaneously close eye . After loss consciousness , succinylcholine 1.5 mg.kg-1 administer tracheal intubation perform 1 minute later BIS value < 60 target propofol Ce reach . After intubation , patient connect mechanical ventilation adjust obtain end-tidal CO2 30 35 mm Hg propofol target concentration reduce 3µg.mL-1 . Anesthesiologists perform loss consciousness assessment intubation blind target propofol Ce . SpO2 , SBP , DBP , MAP HR record minute 10 min 5 minute tracheal intubation study finish .
